title: League not downloading/updating right!
body: I was updating league a couple of months ago and it would fill up then restart and repeat that over and over again. I restarted my computer, uninstalled  and reinstalled and now it looks like the old logo. Now it's doing the same thing again. I'm really upset because I love LOL so much but it doesn't load for me, do you know why I can do to fix it at all?

replies.body: Ehhhhhhh that's not supposed to happen xD! It almost sounds like your patcher is hitting a file that it just can't seem to process for whatever reason. I want to make sure that you get a clean install of the game without any errors, so let's go ahead and use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a reinstall as well as clean uninstall. That should be able to get that update working correctly.
Thank you it's now working properly!
